ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We want to thank other participants from the following institutions for contributions to the alphaviral workshop: Medical Countermeasure Systems Joint Vaccine Acquisition Program (MCS-JVAP), MCS Biotherapeutics Program (MCS-BDTx); U.S. Army Medical Research Institute of Infectious Diseases (USAMRIID); Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA); Center for Vaccine Research at the University of Pittsburgh; Battelle Biomedical Research Center; University of Texas Medical Branch (UTMB); Texas Biomedical Research Institute; and U.S. Army Medical Materiel Development Activity (USAMMDA). We also want to thank Sarah Cooper of JPEO-CBRND for her editorial assistance on the manuscript.
